titles.title: Prioritizing Urgent Claims for Veterans Act
To amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a priority for the Secretary of Veterans Affairs in processing certain claims for compensation.
Prioritizing Urgent Claims for Veterans Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: Prioritizing Urgent Claims for Veterans Act - Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA), in processing veterans claims for compensation, to provide priority over other claimants to: (1) veterans who have attained age 70, (2) veterans who are terminally ill, and (3) veterans who have life-threatening illnesses.
